snippet: The Olympic sprint champion cruised to victory in his first individual race of the season, clocking 46.37 seconds over 400 meters at the GC Foster Classic in Kingston, Jamaica.
lead_paragraph: The Olympic sprint champion cruised to victory in his first individual race of the season, clocking 46.37 seconds over 400 meters at the GC Foster Classic in Kingston, Jamaica.

headline.main: Usain Bolt Wins First Individual Race of 2015
headline.print_headline: Bolt Wins First Individual Race of 2015
